game.title: The Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient scrolls from the lost temple and return them to the village elder.
game.description: The village of Oakwood has been plagued by a series of strange occurrences, and the villagers believe that the cause lies within the long-abandoned temple of the moon goddess. The temple is said to contain ancient scrolls with the knowledge of the old ways, which could bring balance back to the land.
game.reward: 100 gold coins, a magical amulet granting resistance to darkness-based attacks

tasks.objective: Reach the entrance of the lost temple
tasks.description: Make your way through the forest and find the hidden path leading to the temple's entrance.
Use your wits to solve the ancient puzzle and unlock the door to the inner sanctum.
tasks.location: Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess, first chamber

tasks.objective: Retrieve the scrolls from the treasure room
tasks.description: Fight off the temple's guardians and claim the ancient scrolls.
tasks.location: Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess, treasure room
